text: @GavinNewsom WHAT ABOUT THE OC. Are you guys not thinking about the amount of people that are going to try to come here for the 4th because of other counties closures? I work at a mall, close it back down. Stop putting minimum wage(or under) workers at a higher risk of getting COVID-19
